{docbook}
<highlights>
<itemizedlist>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.AuthoringPublicationPlugin">AuthoringPublicationPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Manages the publication lifecycle of web contents and DMS document on a portal page with more states and versions.</para>
  </listitem>
   <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.BaseActionPlugin">BaseActionPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Is an abstract class and the parent of <emphasis role="bold">ScriptActionPlugin</emphasis> and <emphasis role="bold">BPActionPlugin</emphasis>. You can create a link from this plugin to its children.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.BPActionPlugin">BPActionPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Defines the business process action in Workflow.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ContentTypeFilterPlugin">ContentTypeFilterPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Filters WCM node types.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ContextPlugin">ContextPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Stores the context configuration of a publication lifecycle. </para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.CreatePortalPlugin">CreatePortalPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Is an abstract class and the parent of <emphasis role="bold">TaxonomyPlugin</emphasis>. You can create a link from this plugin to its children.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ExcludeMimeTypes">ExcludeIncludeDataTypePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Is used in the <emphasis role="bold">SiteSearchService</emphasis> component to filter the search results before these results are presented on the search page.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.FriendlyPlugin">FriendlyPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Refines URLs in Content.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ImageThumnailPlugin">ImageThumnailPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Configures the file types and get thumbnail for images.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.IgnorePortalPlugin">IgnorePortalPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Is used to avoid deploying data to the existing portals during a new portal creation.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.InitialWebcontentPlugin">InitialWebcontentPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Deploys initial web-contents as the site artifact into the Site Artifact folder of a newly created portal.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.LinkDeploymentPlugin">LinkDeploymentPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Creates predefined Symlinks into the system.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.LockGroupsOrUsersPlugin">LockGroupsOrUsersPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Configures predefined groups or users for lock administration.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ManageDrivePlugin">ManageDrivePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Creates a predefined drive into a repository.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ManageViewPlugin">ManageViewPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Creates a predefined View into a repository.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.PDFThumnailPlugin">PDFThumnailPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Sets the supported file types of PDF thumbnail.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.PortetTemplatePlugin">PortetTemplatePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Imports the view templates into Content List Viewer.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.predifinedProcessesPlugin">predifinedProcessesPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Imports the predefined processes into the system.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.PublicationPlugin">PublicationPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Is an abstract class and the parent of <emphasis role="bold">StageAndVersionPublicationPlugin</emphasis> and <emphasis role="bold">AuthoringPublicationPlugin</emphasis>. You can create a link from this plugin to its children.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.QueryPlugin">QueryPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Stores predefined queries into the repositories of the system.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.RemovePortalPlugin">RemovePortalPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Is an abstract class and the parent of <emphasis role="bold">RemoveTaxonomyPlugin</emphasis>. You can create a link from this plugin to its children.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.RemoveTaxonomyPlugin">RemoveTaxonomyPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Invalidates taxonomy trees in categories folder of a portal when the portal is removed.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ScriptActionPlugin">ScriptActionPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Imports the predefined script actions into the system.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.ScriptPlugin">ScriptPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Adds groovy scripts into the system.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.StageAndVersionPublicationPlugin">StageAndVersionPublicationPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Controls the state life cycle of a content.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.StatesLifecyclePlugin">StatesLifecyclePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Controls the state life cycle of a content.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.TagPermissionPlugin">TagPermissionPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Configures the predefined permission for tags to inject in JCR.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.TagStylePlugin">TagStylePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para> Configures the predefined styles for tags to inject in JCR.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.TaxonomyPlugin">TaxonomyPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Configures the predefined taxonomies to inject into JCR.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.TemplatePlugin">TemplatePlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Creates templates into the system. A template is a presentation to display the saved information.</para>
  </listitem>
  <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins.XMLdeploymentPlugin">XMLdeploymentPlugin</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Deploys some "default" contents, such as Banner, Footer, Navigation, and Breadcrumb of a website.</para>
  </listitem>
</itemizedlist>
</highlights>
{docbook}

This section describes the main component plugins used in Content.
Each part supplies an example configuration with the explanation about ini-params so you can know how to use these plugins.

{docbook}
